# Hecto Financial 개발자 문서

## 주요 문서 섹션

### PG 결제 서비스
- 시작하기: https://chan-docs.vercel.app/pg/01-getting-started.md
- 신용카드 결제: https://chan-docs.vercel.app/pg/02-credit-card.md
- 가상계좌 결제: https://chan-docs.vercel.app/pg/03-virtual-account.md
- 계좌이체 결제: https://chan-docs.vercel.app/pg/04-bank-transfer.md
- 휴대폰 결제: https://chan-docs.vercel.app/pg/05-mobile-payment.md
- 상품권 결제: https://chan-docs.vercel.app/pg/06-gift-card.md
- 포인트다모아: https://chan-docs.vercel.app/pg/07-point-damoa.md
- 간편결제: https://chan-docs.vercel.app/pg/08-simple-payment.md
- 거래조회 및 관리: https://chan-docs.vercel.app/pg/09-transaction-management.md
- 개발 참고 문서: https://chan-docs.vercel.app/pg/10-developer-reference.md

### 내통장결제 서비스 (ezauth)
- 내통장결제 가이드: https://chan-docs.vercel.app/ezauth/hecto_financial_ezauth.md

### 간편현금결제 서비스 (ezcp)
- 간편현금결제 가이드: https://chan-docs.vercel.app/ezcp/hecto_financial_ezcp.md

### 화이트라벨 서비스
- 화이트라벨 가이드: https://chan-docs.vercel.app/whitelabel/hecto_financial_whitelabel.md

### 블로그
- 샘플 아티클 1: https://chan-docs.vercel.app/blog/01-sample-article-1.md
- 샘플 아티클 2: https://chan-docs.vercel.app/blog/02-sample-article-2.md
- 샘플 아티클 3: https://chan-docs.vercel.app/blog/03-sample-article-3.md
